citations.narrative:
A female pomeranian/chihuahua mix was seen jumping over and out of the enclosure during inspection. The facility
reports that this dog doesn't wander from the property but has learned to jump out at times. A dog that is not safely
contained could get injured. Ensure that the enclosures securely contain each dog.
Correct by 1/14/2022.

The written Program of Veterinary Care does not describe a plan for physical exams of each dog and the vaccinations for
adult dogs for parvo and distemper were due Nov 28, 2021 per records and the Program of Veterinary Care (PVC) but
have not been completed. For the health of the dogs; a written plan for physical exams of all dogs is now required and
adult vaccines are required to be completed on time. Ensure that the written PVC is updated with required information
and that adult vaccines are completed as described in the PVC.
Correct by 1/21/2022
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
End Section

narrative:
3.6(a)(2)(ii) 
   
Primary enclosures. 
A female pomeranian/chihuahua mix was seen jumping over  and out of the enclosure during inspection.  The facility 
reports that this dog doesn't wander from the property but has learned to jump out at times.  A dog that is not safely 
contained could get injured.  Ensure that the enclosures securely contain each dog. 
 
Correct by 1/14/2022. 
3.13(a) 
   
Veterinary care for dogs. 
The written Program of Veterinary Care does not describe a plan for physical exams of each dog and the vaccinations for 
adult dogs for parvo and distemper were due Nov 28, 2021 per records and the Program of Veterinary Care (PVC) but 
have not been completed.  For the health of the dogs; a written plan for physical exams of all dogs is now required and 
adult vaccines are required to be completed on time.  Ensure that the written PVC is updated with required information 
and that adult vaccines are completed as described in the PVC. 
 
Correct by 1/21/2022

This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative. 
 
End Section
